input.description:
String Value - configuration name
Example: BMC_AR_System, HP_ServiceCenter, ServiceNow

String Value - A description of the change association
Note: This is a required input for BMC_AR_System

String Value - A description of the incident association
Note: This is a required input for BMC_AR_System

output.description:
String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value â€“ A verbose message indicating the success or failure of the process

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//change) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//change" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Incidents> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//incident) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//incident" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${incident}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Incidents> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Association created for the following Incident ID: ${incident id} and Change ID: ", .)
concat("Unable to create association for Incident ID: ", .)
concat("Unable to create association for Change ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Incidents> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//incident) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//incident" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${incident}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Incidents> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Association created for the following Incident ID: ${incident id} and Change ID: ", .)
concat("Unable to create association for Incident ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <xsl:if test="string-length(.) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:if> <incident-number>${incident number}</incident-number> <change-number>${change number}</change-number> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create association for Incident ID: ", .)
concat("Association created for the following Incident ID: ${incident id} and Change ID: ", .)

documentation.description: This workflow will associate a given incident to a given change record.
